articles.title: 이제 남은 유일한 해자는 돈뿐인가?
articles.summary:
• AI가 대량 생산하는 시대에 인간의 창의적 사고 가치는 하락하고, 인간의 관심(Attention) 은 희소 자원으로 부상
  • 새로운 제품을 만드는 것은 쉬워졌지만, 관심을 얻는 것은 극도로 어려워진 환경으로 전환됨
  • 기존 채널(검색,...

articles.title: 코드 공장 시대와 미래 SRE
articles.summary:
원래는 제 주변에만 공유한 졸문이나, 반응이 괜찮아서 Geeknews에도 공유하여 다른 분들의 생각과 관점을 듣고 싶어서 공유합니다. 홍보성 글로 생각되면 지적해 주십시오!

articles.title: ChatDev 2.0 - 멀티에이전트 협업 기반 Zero-Code 개발 플랫폼
articles.summary:

articles.title: 이란 학생들, 유혈 진압 이후 첫 대규모 반정부 시위 벌여
articles.summary:
• 이란 여러 대학에서 정부에 반대하는 학생 시위가 열렸으며, 이는 1월의 유혈 진압 이후 처음으로 대규모로 진행된 집회임
  • 테헤란의 Sharif 공과대학교를 비롯해 여러 대학에서 학생들이 행진하며 “독재자에게 죽음을” 등 반정부 구호를 외침...

articles.title: 가정용 e-paper 대시보드 Timeframe 개발기
articles.summary:

articles.title: Apple might take a new approach to announcing its next products
articles.summary: Apple has invited the tech press to a “special Apple experience” on March 4, but it might unfold a bit differently than the company's standard press event.

articles.title: Can the creator economy stay afloat in a flood of AI slop?
articles.summary: On the latest episode of Equity, we debated what’s next for the creator economy, and whether there will be any room for the next generation of creators to stand out.

articles.title: Bill Gurley says that right now, the worst thing you can do for your career is play it safe
articles.summary: "The number one thing is to get out of your head this ideal that gets passed around in the self-help world: 'go get a mentor,' and everyone runs out and cold calls someone that's ridiculously too high and unachievable, and it doesn't work."

articles.title: Quantonation’s double-sized second fund shows quantum still has believers
articles.summary: Quantonation Ventures, a venture firm investing in quantum and physics-based startups, has closed its oversubscribed second fund at €220 million, or approximately $260 million. That’s more than twice the size of its inaugural fund, and comes in addition to other signals that the quantum winter isn’t

articles.title: Trump says Netflix will face ‘consequences’ if it doesn’t fire board member Susan Rice
articles.summary: Netflix board member Susan Rice had predicted that corporations that “take a knee” to Trump will be “held accountable” when Democrats return to power.
